name: IMMZ.DT.07.Rotavirus
description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Rotavirus vaccine according to the defined schedule

action.title: Immunize Patient for Rotavirus - No Doses
action.description: Provide Rotavirus immunizations – using the "Rotavirus vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (2-3 scheme depends on product)

expression.description: "Rotavirus vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses" and "Patient age" <= "6 weeks"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Rotavirus 1st dose

action.title: Immunize Patient for Rotavirus - 1 Rotavirus dose previously given 2 dose scheme
action.description: Provide Rotavirus immunizations – using the "Rotavirus vaccine immunization schedule" – minimum of 4 weeks after previous dose assuming 2 dose scheme

expression.description: "Rotavirus vaccine given 1 dose in immunization history" = "1 Rotavirus dose" and "Scheme" = "2 dose"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with Rotavirus 2nd dose

action.title: Immunize Patient for Rotavirus - 1 Rotavirus dose previously given 3 dose scheme
action.description: Provide Rotavirus immunizations – using the "Rotavirus vaccine immunization schedule" – minimum of 4 weeks after previous dose assuming 3 dose scheme

expression.description: "Rotavirus vaccine given 1 dose in immunization history" = "1 Rotavirus dose" and "Scheme" = "3 dose"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with Rotavirus 2nd dose

action.title: Immunize Patient for Rotavirus - 2 Rotavirus dose previously given 3 dose scheme
action.description: Provide Rotavirus immunizations – using the "Rotavirus vaccine immunization schedule" – minimum of 4 weeks after previous dose assuming 3 dose scheme

expression.description: "Rotavirus vaccine given 2 dose in immunization history" = "3 Rotavirus dose"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with Rotavirus 3rd dose

action.title: Immunize Patient for Rotavirus - Missed Dose
action.description: Provide the 2nd or 3rd dose without repeating the previous dose in the scheme, even if after the 4 week window

expression.expression: Should vaccinate the patient is next appriopriate dose.

action.title: Resume 3 dose scheme if known or unavailable previous 2 dose product
action.description: Provide the 2nd or 3rd dose without repeating the previous dose in the scheme, even if after the 4 week window
